item.title: Open Papyrus Perspective
item.description: Start setting up your environment perspective.

item.title: Create a new proteus project
item.description:
Start creating the project that will host your solution model.
File > New > Project > Papyrus project > Enter your project name, then select proteus as diagram language and the problem model template. On the next page, choose the diagrams that you want to create and the problem template that you want to load.
